data.comment: The match is underway in Gwangju.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Play has been interrupted briefly in Gwangju to check on Cho Jae-wan, who is grimacing with pain.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 4, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gwangju are caught offside.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 7, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sin Se-gye for Gangwon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
At Gwangju World Cup Stadium, Yeo Reum has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 9, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sin Se-gye for Gangwon is back on the field again.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 12, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Gwangju.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gangwon's Lee Yeong-jae breaks free at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Can Gwangju capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gangwon's half?
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju.
In the minute 18, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Gangwon's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Gwangju.
Gwangju are pushing forward but Lee Min-ki's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Gangwon at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Kim Seung-dae puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Cho Jae-wan.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Gwangju.
Gwangju's Felipe Silva attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Throw-in Gwangju.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
In the minute 24, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Eom Won-sang levels the match at 1-1.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Gangwon.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 32, Attention is being given to Gwangjuâ€™s Eom Won-sang and play has been suspended briefly.
Eom Won-sang has recovered and rejoins the match in Gwangju.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
The away team replace Seo Min-woo with Jung Suk-hwa.
Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 41, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gangwon just outside Gwangju's area.
Han Kook-young for Gangwon drives towards goal at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gangwon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Gwangju's Felipe Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Gwangju.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Lee Jae-kwon is replacing Han Kook-young for Gangwon at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 47, Gwangju's Felipe Silva is whistled for offside at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Im Chai-min (Gangwon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gwangju are coming forward and Willyan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Gangwon have a goal kick.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Willyan.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju.
In the minute 58, Lee Jae-kwon is booked for the away team.
In Gwangju Gwangju attack through Felipe Silva. The finish is off target, however.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Gangwon a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Gwangju.
Free kick Gangwon.
Cho Jae-wan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gangwon.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the home team a throw-in.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju.
In the minute 65, Willyan of Gwangju gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Gangwon throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 70, Ko Mu-yeol is on a sub for Lee Yeong-jae for Gangwon.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Gwangju's Hong Jun-ho has been booked in Gwangju.
In the minute 71, Han Heui-hun is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Park Jin Seob (Gwangju) is making a first change, with Yeo Bong-hun replacing the possibly injured Han Heui-hun.
Gangwon's Kim Ji-hyeon goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Park Jeong-su (Gwangju) has received a yellow card from Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 79, Gangwon's Kim Ji-hyeon gets in a shot on goal at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Gangwon go level at 2-2 through Ko Mu-yeol in Gwangju.
In the minute 80, Great play from Kim Ji-hyeon to set up the goal.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 84, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Rustamjon Ashurmatov (Gwangju) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 85, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Park Jin Seob (Gwangju) is making a second substitution, with Du Hyeon-seok replacing Eom Won-sang.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Gwangju.
In the minute 87, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, At Gwangju World Cup Stadium, Gwangju are penalized for being offside.
Free kick Gwangju.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gwangju are coming forward and Du Hyeon-seok gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Gangwon a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Gangwon's area.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Sang-Hyeop Chae blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
